entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 11:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Wind: NNE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to light snow before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
